txt.en:
'Uruks are loathesome, vicious creatures without a shred of honour or courage... only a mindless rage and a lust for blood.

'Their general is no different, save for the fervour of his hatred. He serves the Iron Crown without question and leads his army into battle without mercy. Defeat him, and you will prove your mettle.

'You will find him in the deepest reaches of Urugarth to the west.'
'So, it is done. It will not bring back the slain, but it will perhaps give me peace knowing my people have been avenged.'
'Go into Urugarth and defeat their general.'
You defeated many Orcs in Urugarth, but your task is not yet complete. The Uruk-leader remains.
The leader of the Orc-army makes his home deep within Urugarth, west of Gath Forthnír.\n\nDonaith told you of a mighty Uruk-general that must be defeated.
Donaith is at Gath Forthnír, east of Urugarth.\n\nYou should return to Gath Forthnír and tell Donaith the good news of your victory.
